values: When Rosa and I left for the Mediterranean, we had no idea that we would come across her family in the Oasis. Her family was giving rides to the nice visitors. Aren't they wonderful? I stubbed my little camel toe on a rock, and I had to see the doctor, oh my goodness. He wrapped it up for me, and then I went off with Rosa for some lovely sea food in the ocean. What a wonderful view. Jamie and Megan are always on my mind, they are so wonderful to have adopted me. I feel bad that I do not see them much, but they tell me that they still love me which makes me glisten from my furry nose to my scruffy tail. I think I might ask Rosa to marry me. I am very much in love with this beautiful camel. We will make lovely baby camels together, and take them backpacking across the world. Oh my goodness. Habeeb <3

So my poor little camel toes are so very sore. I have been back packing across Europe for several weeks. Rosa and I are still very much so in love. It is nice to have a furry little face to wake up next to in the morning. Though, sometimes she does spit on me in our sleep. 

I purchased a beautiful rug in El Savador the other day. The man who sold it to me tried to tell me it could fly. I am not a stupid camel, you know!

Next time Rosa and I go back to Florida to visit our two very best friends, we are going to have them scan our wonderful pictures from all of our vacations. Our toes are too big to use such little machines. We do not want to break anything. So I am very sorry that you must have to wait.

Rosa's parents seem to like me, which makes me very happy in the humps. 

My friends Megan and Jamie sent me what my name means too! My name is of Arabic origin and it means "beloved one". How very nice.

I must be going now. My nephew is trying to spit on my girlfriend!

<3 Habeeb

I woood like to start by apologyzing for my lack of camel updates. I have been learning how to play American Ping Pong! It is quiet a sport. I do think I could beat Lt. Dan and his friend Forest. Me and my girlfriend Rosa are quiet the Oasian athletes. Oh yes. They made us special trophies. My first one. How special. I will have to put it into a case down at my friend Abara's Quickie Mart for all to see. I do want to say happy birthday to Jamie, and I hope she liked my special heehaw that I have sent her.

<3 Habeeb

OH MY GOODNESS> FROM COSTA RICA< it was the best trip I have ever taken, except the one across the desert here with j and m. I met a lovely girl names, Rosa and surfed until my little camel heart was content. I got a bit of sunburn on my little hump and on my little , adroable camel toes. Sad. I wore zinc on my nose to protect it from harmful rays. would not want wrinkles like osama bin laden! Ohmigoodness! I could not have eaten enough yummy costa rican food. and the people couldn't have been nicer to me! I am so glad to be back to town with j and m. tomorrow night is ppv and I get to meet sir styles for first time. will take many pictures. Well, i have to go call rosa, I tell her I would call when i got home. Much love and surfing peace.

<3 Habeeb

OHHHH-MI-GOODNESS!!! Does anyone know how goddam hard it is to find a computer here in Costa Rica? let alone a computer with internet.. onmi goodness!! It is almost impossible. but right now, I am at an internet cafe, having a Camel-Late..it is excuisite! I am here surfing, making Jamie jealous for that and working on my spanish accent.  I am eating a lot of yummy food and making lots of friends. There are lots of nanni nanni's here that I am going to steal one for megan! Ohh, my minutes are almost out and I still have to check my MySpace! Love J and M!

<3 Habeeb

Oh-mi-goodness, I have so many new friends. well, 2. but I love it. 

*pour like water over me. so if i just exist for the next 10 minutes of this ride, that would be fine.*

WORD TO YOUR CAMEL FACE!

<3 Habeeb

Oh, yesterday at the pool, I met a woman. She is the most beautiful in all of this world! I couldn't wait to show her to you, so I whipped out Meg's digi cam (oh, how I love all this technology..its so new to me). And i snapped a lovely photo. You can view it here: Oh, and jame's bro, Russ, finally finished my ginormous sized keyboard so my camel toes can type! No more little letters for me!! <3 Habeeb

OH-mi-goodness. I am a little sunburnt on the tip of my nose from laying by the pool yesterday. I haven't been is such HotHotHeat is quite some time. He-Haw! But it is too early to be up this morning. I am going back to bed.. later in the day, I am going down to Some place that starts with an * for some crap Megan talked me into.  oh, sorry, that would be confidential. If I told you, I'd have to spit on you! Ohh-k, I have to go make some breakfast for Jamie now.

<3 Habeeb

I finally have a LJ. I am so excited now that I can comment in Megan and Jamie's LJ. Today, I went to the pool and ate some wasps that were chasing Jamie and Megan around.. The carrot oil will do that. I only wish there were sand there at the pool. I miss my Oasis...my Home. Someday, I shall return..but until then, I shall rock it with my girls, j and m. GODDAMIT WOMAN'S!! HEHE-HAW

<3  <--this is my little, adorable camel-toe's... Habeeb
